name: 01-setup
description: * Install NodeJS * Create Node Environment `npm init -y`   * Install nodemon : `npm install -D nodemon` * Start the Application : `nodemon index.js` * write the scripts     - To avoid typing `nodemon index.js` every time, you can modify the scripts section of your package.json file.      ```json       "scripts": {       "start": "node index.js",       "dev": "nodemon index.js"       },     ``` * Start the Application : `npm run dev`
